name: Signed Labor of Love CD + 3D Glasses
description:
An actual CD! Not just 1's and 0's through the interwebs. We're talking liner notes, album artwork, the whole enchilada people. I'll even put my John Hancock on it. BOOM.

01. This Lonely
02. Fast Forward (Featuring Jessica Campbell)
03. Still Alive
04. Lucy Wears Red
05. Loved 
06. Brave Enough
07. Something Beautiful
08. I'd Look Good On You
09. Radio
10. Here & Gone
11. Sweetness

This album is truly a Labor of Love as I put hundreds of hours into the writing, recording, producing, and mixing. I even designed the artwork. Oh yea, the record comes with paper 3D Red/Cyan glasses to view the album cover design. Because everything is better in 3D! #amirite?

NOTE: Official release date is Oct 22, 2013. If pre-ordering, every effort will be made to deliver the record on ON the 22nd. 

Combine with a Labor of Love V-neck, or other multiple items to get a discount on shipping. That's no laughing matter. Seriously. 

No, seriously.

name: Labor of Love V-Neck (Coffee)
description:
The softest damn shirt you'll ever wear, and let's be honest, you look GREAT in earth tones (who doesn't?).  100% American Apparel, sweatshop free, made in 'Merica.

Tri-Blend (50% Polyester / 25% Cotton / 25% Rayon). That means 3 times the amount of awesome (or shall I say "f'awesome") as a regular t-shirt.

This shirt is FDA approved, and guaranteed* to cure shyness, bad luck, halitosis, and boredom.

*not actually guaranteed.

Combine with a Labor of Love CD, or other multiple items to get a discount on shipping.

name: Labor of Love V-Neck (Navy)
description:
The softest damn shirt you'll ever wear, and let's be honest, you look GREAT in Navy (who doesn't?).  100% American Apparel, sweatshop free, made in freakin US of A. #USA #USA

Tri-Blend (50% Polyester / 25% Cotton / 25% Rayon). That means 3 times the amount of awesome (or shall I say "f'awesome") as a regular t-shirt. Ever wonder what super heroes wear underneath their iron suits, capes, and bat armor? Yup, this t-shirt. Now you know.

This shirt is FDA approved, and guaranteed** to cure shyness, bad luck, halitosis, boredom, hangnails, my-turn-signal-is-on-even-though-I'm-not-turning syndrome, and the common cold.

*not actually guaranteed.

Combine with a Labor of Love CD, or other multiple items to get a discount on shipping.
